ADD_EXECUTABLE(Home.wt Home.C)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Home.wt ${EXAMPLES_CONNECTOR})

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
  ${WT_SOURCE_DIR}/src
  ${WT_SOURCE_DIR}/examples/treelist
)

#
# Create a deploy script
#
SET(APPNAME wt-homepage)
SET(APPBIN Home.wt)

SET(APPRESOURCES
    "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/icons ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/images ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.xml ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.css")

SET(APPRESOURCES
    "${APPRESOURCES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.C ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.h")

SET(APPRESOURCES
    "${APPRESOURCES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../simplechat/*.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../simplechat/*.C ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../simplechat/*.css ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../simplechat/*.xml")

SET(APPRESOURCES
    "${APPRESOURCES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../hello/*.C")

SET(APPRESOURCES
    "${APPRESOURCES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../composer/*.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../composer/*.C ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../composer/*.xml ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../composer/*.css")

SET(APPRESOURCES
    "${APPRESOURCES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../charts/*.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../charts/*.C ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../charts/*.xml ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../charts/*.css")

SET(APPRESOURCES
    "${APPRESOURCES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../treeview-dragdrop/*.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../treeview-dragdrop/*.C ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../treeview-dragdrop/*.xml ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../treeview-dragdrop/*.css")

SET(APPRESOURCES
    "${APPRESOURCES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../gitmodel/*.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../gitmodel/*.C ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../gitmodel/*.xml ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../gitmodel/*.css")

  ${WT_SOURCE_DIR}/deploy.sh
